attributes.action: Allow Alan Davis in the Big brother house because he cracks me up!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being madly in love with Alan Davis and admiring his fortitude (my kind of guy) can't the PM pull a few strings? Also, while I'm here, please can the PM insist Alan grows his hair again as he suits the "Wild and Needs a Vigorous Cuddle" look. I am also worried about him sleeping out on his Big Brother quest so could a tent with mini bar also be provided? Thank you, Sue x

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
